### <a name="Endpoint">Endpoint</a>

Description: 
Endpoints represent dynamically discovered address/ports where an upstream service is listening

```yaml
"upstreams": []core.solo.io.ResourceRef
"address": string
"port": int
"metadata": .core.solo.io.Metadata

```

| Field | Type | Description | Default |
| ----- | ---- | ----------- |----------- | 
| upstreams | [[]core.solo.io.ResourceRef](core/ref.proto.sk.md#ResourceRef) | List of the upstreams the endpoint belongs to |  |
| address | string | Address of the endpoint (ip or hostname) |  |
| port | int | listening port for the endpoint |  |
| metadata | [.core.solo.io.Metadata](core/metadata.proto.sk.md#Metadata) | Metadata contains the object metadata for this resource |  |
